name: Rock Dawg Racer
description:
Taste the deadly heights with powerful off-road machines. Hit the gas and climb up to the top of this Rock Dawg!
And Race against other Rock Dawg Racers.
Do you have what it takes to survive this hell?

GREAT Features:

G- orgeous graphics
R- eal-time vehicle deformation
E-xclusive iPhone5 ultra graphics detail
A- mazing physics simulation
T- antalizing offroad vehicles
